text: The student will analyze, interpret, and evaluate artwork.
subject: Visual Art
subs: Analyze how visual organization in works of art affects the communication of ideas.
Analyze the uses and impact of persuasive techniques (e.g., selection of images, design, type, media) in print and contemporary media.
Communicate how personal experiences influence critical interpretations and evaluations of works of art.
Formulate a working definition of art.
Analyze purposes, values, and meanings of works of art.
Critique personal work and the work of others to refine the quality of technical skill and communication of creative intent.
